page.title: 08Four Events/Runnymede School
page.content: {September -Harvest Festival} "I brought a melon.Our teacher brought a big pumpkin.Other children brought fruit and vegetables to put on display and after the service we took the food to an Old Peoples' Home" {March -Hatching chickens "We put 24 eggs in an incubator. We turned the eggs every day and 3 weeks later a chick broke out of its shell.Next day there were 4 more,a ginger one and a black one we called Sooty" {June -Factory Outing "We went to a brick factory.It was very dusty and hot.Inside the kiln it was 1050 degrees centigrade". {July -Sports Day "We had races on the school field. We had skipping,the sprint,sack,relay and 3-legged races".
